example_sentence_english: They created an environmental police force.

notes: plural form; used for different forces

example_sentence_italian: Delle polizie straniere partecipano al progetto.
example_sentence_english: Some foreign police forces take part in the project.

example_sentence_italian: Il ruolo della polizia è chiaro.
example_sentence_english: The role of the police is clear.
I report the theft to the police.
He was stopped by the police.
I read an article about the police.
We write to the regional police forces.
The data come from the police forces.

example_sentence_italian: Le riforme nelle polizie sono necessarie.
example_sentence_english: Reforms in the police forces are necessary.

example_sentence_italian: Il rapporto sulle polizie è pubblico.
example_sentence_english: The report on the police forces is public.
We coordinate with the local police forces.
